attributes.action: Families Need Fathers - the current family Law Act needs proper reform
attributes.additional_details: Hard working fathers (i.e. having to pay their own legal bills) are discriminated against by the Family Court system, I speak from experience. We are not second class citizens, don't treat us as such. We are valuable to society. We care, we love and we cherish our children, recognise that please for our childrens sake.
